description.value: This grouping value set contains a broad set of terms that represent a woman who is pregnant at any stage during her pregnancy. Includes terminology related to pregnancy state, condition, diagnoses, outcomes, encounters, diagnostic tests, and lab results.

purpose.value: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Condition/Diagnosis/Problem, Laboratory Test (results), Diagnostic Study Test (Result) and Physical Exam (expression of the answers/responses for the physical exam component), and Encounter.
